content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm just an AI, I don't have personal experiences or try out coffee methods myself. I'm here to provide information and answer questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I'm happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have about pour-over coffee or reconnecting with old friends. It's great that you're interested in trying out pour-over coffee, and I'm here to provide you with tips and advice to help you get started.

Regarding reconnecting with old friends, it's always wonderful to catch up with familiar faces and make new memories together. Did you and your friend make plans to meet up again soon?
